name: Dos Ojos, Turtles & Yal-Ku
description: The ultimate snorkeling combo in the Riviera Maya! We'll snorkel in three of the most famous snorkeling areas in the Riviera Maya on this amazing excursion. First stop will be snorkeling in famous Dos Ojos Cenote, where we'll snorkel in a magic underwater kingdom of stalactites, stalagmites illuminated by the sun's rays shining through the roof of the cavern for a breathtaking landscape you can't find anywhere else in the world.  Something totally unique to Riviera Maya.
